g.text: UMA-compliant communications platform - Alice to Bob (push data) - Alice involved
• publishes its metadata on a URL https:
• is registered at Alice's IAM Server and is assigned 'query-users', 'view-users' admin roles, thus can query and view any user to get their claims
• is registered at foo.com IAM Server and pre-registered as a universal AEMS public client at bar.com UMA Server
bar.com admin has set up the Resource Server and registers it's resource
'Incoming' at the bar.com UMA Server with the associated scope 'create'
if the payload is large, consider using PCT (see UMA specs. for details)
In addition to claims_token, pushed claims may also contain metadata such as:
• file_info (filename, file size, file digest, mime type)
3. bootstrap discovery of Claims Provider config url from email address via WebFinger;
if this doesn't work, build well-known url using domain part of email_address
9. evaluate other optional claims e.g. recipient_info, file_info
